Package org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.pagemodel

Class PageComponent

java.lang.Object
org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.pagemodel.PageComponent
public class PageComponent extends Object
Represents a component in PageModel API responses. Provides access to component properties, models, and child references.

    • hasModel

      public boolean hasModel(String modelName)
      Checks if this component has a model with the given name.
      Parameters:
      modelName - model name to check
      Returns:
      true if the model exists

    • getModelAs

      public <T> T getModelAs(String modelName, Class<T> type)
      Converts a model to a custom POJO type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - target type
      Parameters:
      modelName - model name
      type - target class
      Returns:
      converted object, or null if model not present

    • getDocumentRef

      public Optional<ContentRef> getDocumentRef()
      Gets the document reference from the models map. Looks for a "document" model that contains a $ref.
      Returns:
      Optional containing the document ref, or empty if not present

    • isContainer

      public boolean isContainer()
      Checks if this component is a container (has children).
      Returns:
      true if component has child components
